segments.text: Watching the water cascade from the sink, I feel a sense of unease.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman has one foot in the puddle, yet she seems completely lost in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if she slips and falls? It sends a shiver down my spine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy is reaching deeper into the cookie jar, his concentration remarkable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I admire his determination, but it feels so reckless at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is eagerly waiting, her anticipation palpable, and it makes me smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, the thought of what could go wrong hangs heavy in the air.
segments.speaker: PAR
